boardgame.name: Abenteuerland
Adventure Land
Avonturenland
Odyssée-Land
boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Adventure Land, King Agamis rules from his castle. Rich cities, vast forests and rugged mountain ranges dominate the country. The large river is known to be lined with gold and the forests filled with medicinal herbs, but dangers lurk beneath the fog! Only the bravest adventurers dare to face the challenges. When you move your adventurer tactically and bravely fight the fog creatures, you'll win the favor of the king. Illustrated by Franz Vohwinkel and designed by acclaimed duo Wolfgang Kramer and Michael Kiesling who between them have won the highly coveted Spiel des Jahres award 5 times._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are three different adventure scenarios to choose from, depending on the age/skill of the players: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-Adventure 1 (The Fellowship ) the simplest of the three adventures_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-Adventure 2 (The Magnificent) a little more challenging_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;-Adventure 3 (Escape to the Cities) the most challenging because there are many things to pay attention to simultaneously_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2016 Nederlandse Spellenprijs Best Family Game Nominee
2016 Nederlandse Spellenprijs Best Family Game Winner

Ask for specific shipping quote. Most ship USPS, but, we will also check Fed Ex. Fed Ex can be cheaper when going to a business address. UPS is almost always more than the other two. Thanks for taking time to look at our listing.

This sale has been auto-generated for the auction: [geekurl=/geeklist/205457/item/4480584#4480584]Item for Geeklist _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t miss this incredible 3-day $5 auction!!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; [/geekurl] Please do not purchase if you didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t win this auction. beek man only!

I am offering an expansion: a set of 4 bonus herb tiles General rules: The 4 tiles are set out face down and shuffled in a stack. If a player picks up an herb tile with the value of “2,” they can immediately trade it for one of these bonus herb tiles. To do so, the player picks up the top tile from the stack of bonus herb tiles. The traded-in herb tile is removed from the game. 1.1 ”Gold sword“ bonus herb tile 2 dice (instead of just one) can be used for the gold sword. The tile is removed from the game after it has been used. 1.2 ”Platinum sword” bonus herb tile 3 dice (instead of just one) can be used for the platinum sword. The tile is removed from the game after it has been used. 1.3 “Magic gold herbs” bonus herb tile Combat strength is increased by 5 points when the magic gold herb tile is used. The tile is removed from the game after it has been used. 1.4 “Loyal wolf” bonus herb tile Combat strength is increased by 2 points when the wolf tile is used. The wolf remains at the side of the player as a loyal companion and can be used in every battle Not the game, just an expension! New and unplayed.

Edition: Multilingual First Edition (English Packaging)(2015 ) Languages: English, French Condition: Very Good. Note that there appears to be a missing companion - 29 from a listed total of 30 in the instructions. However, it seems the game only uses a maximum of 28 as four players requires 2 put back in the box so there is 1 spare not 2. Since the component was missing from new, if it was a concern then a replacement could probably be requested from Haba.
